content: knit 5 rounds or your preferred length increment then the other loop i find that picking up these three like this leaves very little gaping repeat round 12 increase round again by working m1 before or need for darning when it comes to weaving in the ends each sm in the round stitch count continue with this pattern of increasing every 6 to 12 rounds until 15-21 35 35 39 39 43 43 47 dress measures desired length as shown in table below 22-28 49 49 51 53 57 59 63 © georgie nicolson 2008 all rights reserved lily | 5 both sleeve options next round increase round m1 knit to end of round stitch count 15-21 36 36 40 40 44 44 48 22-28 50 50 52 54 58 60 64 next round knit placing sm halfway around the arm after the 15-21 18th 18th 20th 20th 22nd 22nd 24th 22-28 25th 25th 26th 27th 29th 30th 32nd st next round knit next round increase round knit to sm m1 slipm knit to end of round m1 continue to increase every 5 rounds in the same manner by working m1 before the sms knit sleeves for approximately 15-21 36 40 43 48 54 60 65 22-28 68 78 84 86 90 93 100 rounds or desired length sleeves can be worked plain as pictured or a garter stitch band sleeve cuff can be worked on the upper arm if you are working the garter band skip to the alternative sleeve option instructions below round 1 switch to contrast colour and knit knit round 2 purl 15-21 15 19 22 27 33 36 38 22-28 40 42 44 46 48 50 52 rounds round 3 knit repeat rounds 2 and 3 twice more each alternative sleeve option cast off loosely purl-wise the alternative sleeve option features a garter stitch band around the upper arm knit in contrast yarn to coordinate with the garter complete the second sleeve in the same manner stitch obi sleeve lengths are approximately after picking up sts knit 15-21 5½/14 6/15 5 6½/16 5 7/18 7¾/20 8¼/21 9/23 15-21 6 6 7 7 8 8 8 22-28 9¾/25 11/28 11¾/30 12¼/31 12½/32 13/33 22-28 10 10 12 12 14 14 16 rounds 14/36 inches/cms switch to contrast yarn and your us5/3 75mm needle and work for longer sleeves work more knit row before you begin the sleeve 15-21 6 6 7 7 8 8 8 increases 22-28 8 9 9 9 10 10 10 rounds or your desired width alternating purl and knit rounds for a garter stitch band finishing switch back to the main colour and knit a further weave in ends and gently block dress 15-21 6 10 12 16 20 22 24 wet blocking is recommended 22-28 26 26 26 28 28 30 30 rounds for pattern support please visit my group on ravelry tikki love or email me at georgie@tikkiknits com you can find me on ravelry as tikki please visit website
